flavorText: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

foreignData.flavorText: Häufige Karriereziele der Gruul: Berserker, Schamane, Katapult.
foreignData.name: Geschützturm-Oger
foreignData.text:
Reichweite
Wenn der Geschützturm-Oger ins Spiel kommt und falls du eine andere Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, fügt der Geschützturm-Oger jedem Gegner 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Profesiones a las que aspiran los gruul: berserker, chamán, catapulta.
foreignData.name: Ogro de la torreta
foreignData.text:
Alcance.
Cuando el Ogro de la torreta entre al campo de batalla, si controlas otra criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, el Ogro de la torreta hace 2 puntos de daño a cada oponente.

foreignData.flavorText: Choix de carrière fréquents chez les Gruul : berserker, shamane, catapulte.
foreignData.name: Ogre des tourelles
foreignData.text:
Portée
Quand l'Ogre des tourelles arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous contrôlez une autre créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4, l'Ogre des tourelles inflige 2 blessures à chaque adversaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Occupazioni più comunemente ambite dai Gruul: berserker, sciamano, catapulta.
foreignData.name: Ogre della Torretta
foreignData.text:
Raggiungere
Quando l'Ogre della Torretta entra nel campo di battaglia, se controlli un'altra creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, l'Ogre della Torretta infligge 2 danni a ogni avversario.

foreignData.flavorText: グルールに人気の仕事は、狂戦士か、シャーマンか、投石係だ。
foreignData.name: 砲塔のオーガ
foreignData.text:
到達
砲塔のオーガが戦場に出たとき、あなたがパワーが４以上の他のクリーチャーをコントロールしている場合、砲塔のオーガは各対戦相手にそれぞれ２点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — オーガ・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: 그룰의 일반적인 진로 희망: 광전사, 주술사, 투석기.
foreignData.name: 포탑 오우거
foreignData.text:
대공
포탑 오우거가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 다른 생물을 조종한다면, 포탑 오우거는 각 상대에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Aspirações profissionais comuns para os Gruul: amoque, xamã, catapulta.
foreignData.name: Ogro da Torreta
foreignData.text:
Alcance
Quando Ogro da Torreta entra no campo de batalha, se você controla outra criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, Ogro da Torreta causa 2 pontos de dano a cada oponente.

foreignData.flavorText: Каждый Груул мечтает когда-нибудь стать берсерком, шаманом или катапультой.
foreignData.name: Башенный Огр
foreignData.text:
Захват
Когда Башенный Огр выходит на поле битвы, если под вашим контролем есть другое существо с силой 4 или больше, то Башенный Огр наносит 2 повреждения каждому оппоненту.

foreignData.flavorText: 古鲁常见的职业目标：狂战士、祭师、投石兵。
foreignData.name: 炮台食人魔
foreignData.text:
延势
当炮台食人魔进战场时，若你操控另一个力量等于或大于4的生物，则炮台食人魔向每位对手各造成2点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 古魯常見的職業目標：狂戰士、祭師、投石兵。
foreignData.name: 炮台食人魔
foreignData.text:
延勢
當炮台食人魔進戰場時，若你操控另一個力量等於或大於4的生物，則炮台食人魔向每位對手各造成2點傷害。

name: Turret Ogre
originalText:
Reach
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.

rulings.text: If you don't control another creature with power 4 or greater immediately after Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, its ability doesn't trigger, even if you can raise a creature's power right away. If you control no other creature with power 4 or greater as the ability resolves, nothing happens. These don't have to be the same creature, though.
Turret Ogre's ability doesn't deal more than 2 damage to each opponent if you control more than one other creature with power 4 or greater.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Turret Ogre's ability causes the opposing team to lose 4 life.

text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
